name: Rushing Cube
description:
In this game you have to control the cube and go through various and meanwhile exciting levels, by the way, you must not crash into any obstacle, otherwise you yourself know what will happen.

You have the ability to change your cube.

In general, I will immediately throw in the control instructions. 

It is very easy, but even without this the game will make you sweat a little =)

Controls:

A, D or Right and Left Arrow is the control of the cube.

Esc - pause button.
